scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p dist/scripts/modules dist/assets dist/webFonts/ParisAvenue && cp -r assets/* dist/assets && cp -r webFonts/* dist/webFonts/ && cp index.html diensten.html over.html contact.html dist/ && cp scripts/main.js dist/scripts/main.js && cp -r scripts/modules/* dist/scripts/modules/ && cp styles/main.css dist/styles/main.css
